mapper.select: SELECT c.commentId, c.userId, c.postId, c.content, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, u.nickname, u.profileImg FROM comment as c JOIN user as u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE c.postId=#{postId} LIMIT 3;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, content, username) VALUES (#{comment.postId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.username});
